org.cloudgraph.hbase.io

Class DistributedGraphWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudgraph.hbase.io.WriterSupport
      • org.cloudgraph.hbase.io.DistributedGraphWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistributedOperation, DistributedWriter

    public class DistributedGraphWriter
extends WriterSupport
implements DistributedWriter
    Encapsulates one or more graph table writer components for federation across multiple physical tables and/or physical table rows. Maps physical configured table names to respective table writers. In most usage scenarios, a "root" table writer is typically added initially, then other writers are incrementally added as association target types are detected and found configured as graph roots within another distinct table context.

    Acts as a container for one or more TableWriter elements encapsulating a set of component table write operations for federation across multiple tables, or a single table in the most simple (degenerate) case.

    Since:
    0.5.1
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
    See Also:
    GraphTableWriter, GraphTable
